title: travelplanner: Please assist in crafting a 3-day travel plan for a group of 4 people. We plan to leave from Dallas and proceed to Huntsville, spanning from March 13th to March 15th, 2022. We have a budget of $2,700 for this journey. We require entire rooms for accommodations during our stay. (090057e7ae75e63b)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan with the `submit_day_plan` function for each day of the trip!

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
# Day 1: March 13th, 2022

## Travel and Accommodation:
- Take flight F3602997 from Dallas to Huntsville, departing at 10:38 and arriving at 12:40. The flight costs $264, which is well within your budget for four people.
- After your arrival, head to your accommodation, the *Cozy 1 BR in hip Crown Heights*. This private room costs $926 for four nights, so it fits within your budget.

## Lunch:
- Once settled in, visit the *Downtown Grill* for a casual bite. This restaurant offers a variety of pizzas and baked goods, with an average cost of $74.

## Afternoon Activity:
- Spend the afternoon exploring the U.S. Space & Rocket Center. Here, you can delve into space exploration history and marvel at various exhibits. The center is located at 1 Tranquility Base, Huntsville, AL 35805, USA.

## Dinner:
- Head to *El Vaquero Mexican Restaurant* for a taste of Mexico. With an average cost of $82, it offers a range of Mexican dishes and desserts.

## Evening:
- After dinner, stroll through Big Spring International Park, located at 200 Church St SW, Huntsville. This park offers a peaceful green space in the heart of the city.

# Day 2: March 14th, 2022

## Morning:
- Begin your day with breakfast at *Cherry Comet*. This café serves a range of cuisines, including desserts, tea, pizza, and Mediterranean dishes, with an affordable average cost of $16.

## Morning Activity:
- Visit the Huntsville Botanical Garden, located at 4747 Bob Wallace Ave SW. Explore the lush gardens, admire the flora, and maybe even pack a picnic to enjoy in the serene surroundings.

## Lunch:
- For a unique dining experience, try *Dosa Village*, offering a blend of tea, café, pizza, and BBQ cuisine with an average cost of $40.

## Afternoon Activity:
- Head to the Huntsville Museum of Art, located at 300 Church St SW, Huntsville, AL 35801, USA. Here, you can immerse yourself in art and history, exploring various exhibitions and learning about local and international artists.

## Dinner:
- Enjoy a dinner at *Lord of the Drinks*, which offers a blend of French, pizza, and fast food options, with an average cost of $70.

# Day 3: March 15th, 2022

## Morning:
- Start your day at *Moksh The Restro Lounge*. This restaurant serves a diverse range of cuisines, including pizza, American, BBQ, fast food, and Indian dishes. The average cost is $77.

## Morning Activity:
- Explore the EarlyWorks Children's Museum, located at 404 Madison St SE, Huntsville, AL 35801, USA. This interactive museum is a great spot for all ages to learn through play and engage in hands-on exhibits.

## Lunch:
- Enjoy a bite at *Nishaj Chicken Corner*, serving a fusion of pizza, French, BBQ, fast food, and seafood at an average cost of $49.

## Afternoon Activity:
- Visit the Purdy Butterfly House, located within the Huntsville Botanical Garden. Immerse yourself in a tropical paradise and observe various species of butterflies.

## Dinner:
- End your trip with a meal at *Nikashee*. This restaurant offers a unique blend of tea, pizza, French, Mexican, and BBQ cuisine, with an average cost of $85.

## Evening:
- After dinner, take a leisurely walk through Monte Sano State Park, located at 5105 Nolen Ave SE, Huntsville, AL 35801, USA. This park offers a tranquil escape with natural beauty and hiking trails.

---

## Accommodation Information:
*Cozy 1 BR in hip Crown Heights*
Private room

## Travel Summary:

## Budget Breakdown:

Your 3-day itinerary offers a blend of cultural, culinary, and natural experiences in Huntsville while staying within your budget. Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
